description: Palmolive Clarifying Micellar Hair Conditioner is pH balanced for daily use and infused with Natural Rose Oil. Contains 0% silicones.Made with gentle yet effective cleansing micellar water, Palmolive Micellar Shampoo & Conditioner act like a magnet to capture and lift away impurities without stripping hair. Infused with natural Rose Oil, this aromatic and lightweight conditioner works to gently moisturise hair, without leaving build-up. pH balanced for daily use and contains 0% silicones.Hair is left feeling beautifully hydrated, soft and healthy.Palmolive Clarifying Micellar Hair Conditioner is lightweight and contains 0% siliconesMicellar ingredient lifts away impurities without stripping hair's natural moisture.Gently moisturises hair and doesn't leave build-up.Hair is left feeling beautifully hydrated, soft and healthy.pH balanced and infused with Natural Rose Oil.
name: Palmolive Clarifying Micellar Conditioner Rose Oil 370mL
